data.title: How to Watch Top Gun: Maverick – Where to Stream Online in 2023
data.meta_description: Wondering how to watch or stream Top Gun: Maverick? We have all of the details about showtimes and streaming.
data.text:
36 years after Top Gun first hit theaters, Tom Cruise is back as beloved fighter pilot Pete “Maverick” Mitchell. Despite sky-high expectations, it appears the sequel is well worth the wait: Top Gun: Maverick holds a 97% on Rotten Tomatoes, while IGN’s review called it “an out-of-bounds blast of afterburner fumes and thrillseeker highs that's sure to please audiences looking for a classic summer blockbuster.”

Top Gun: Maverick is now finally available to stream online after becoming the highest-grossing Paramount film ever made. If you're wondering how and where you can watch it yourself, take a look at the information below.

How to Stream Top Gun: Maverick Online

Top Gun Maverick has hit streaming and you can now watch it free with a Paramount+ subscription. If you don't have that streaming service, however, you can still rent or buy the film on various other platforms.

Paramount+ (Stream)

Amazon Prime Video (Rent/Buy)

YouTube (Rent/Buy)

Vudu (Ren/Buy)

Apple TV (Rent/Buy)

How to Get Paramount+ for Free

If you've never subscribed to Paramount+ before, you are elligible for a free trial. All you need to do is head to the Paramount+ signup page and create an account and enter your payment information.

Where to Watch the First Top Gun Online

If you want to watch or re-watch the first Top Gun movie before diving into the sequel, you have a few options. If you currently have a Paramount+ subscription, you can stream Top Gun for free on either platform. If you don't have that streaming service, you can also rent or purchase the film on Amazon or Apple TV. You can go to the links below to watch the movie.

Paramount+ (Stream)

Amazon (Rent or Buy)

Apple TV (Rent or Buy)

Who’s in the Cast?

Top Gun: Maverick was written by Ehren Kruger, Eric Warren Singer, and Christopher McQuarrie and directed by Joseph Kosinski. It stars the following actors:

Tom Cruise as Capt. Pete “Maverick” Mitchell

Miles Teller as Lt. Bradley “Rooster” Bradshaw

Jennifer Connelly as Penny Benjamin

Jon Hamm as Adm. Beau “Cyclone” Simpson

Ed Harris as Radm. Chester “Hammer” Cain

Val Kilmer as Adm. Tom “Iceman” Kazansky

Rating and Runtime

Top Gun: Maverick is Rated PG-13 for sequences of intense action and some strong language. The film runs for a total of 2 hours and 11 minutes including credits.

Does Top Gun: Maverick Have a Post-Credits Scene?

Top Gun 2 does not have an end-credits scene, so you don't need to stay after the credits start rolling. For more information about the end of the movie, take a look at our guide: Top Gun: Maverick ending explained.
